name: Mind Break - Alpha version 1.0.0
description:
Break all creatures before they dominate you.

------------------------------------------------------------------

This game is still in its early development and planning stage and A LOT will be changed in the future builds. This is more of a test on assets, as well as learning how to program for games.

My plans for this game is that it would be a platformer with rougelike and sandbox elements. My plans to add for the next build are the following:

- Menu screens and working buttons

- Implementing sandbox and rougelike elements

- Adding more levels and characters

- Upgrading the textures

These are plans for the forseeable future and could change throughout time. In any case, if your giving the game a try or just having a look at the page, I appreciate it a lot and I'm open to any feedback :)
